Interface Board

All Superinterfaces:
ClearableBoard, MovableBoard, ScorableBoard, SpawnableBoard
All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleBoard
public interface Board extends MovableBoard, ClearableBoard, SpawnableBoard, ScorableBoard
Main board interface composed of segregated interfaces. Follows Interface Segregation Principle - clients can depend on specific interfaces (e.g., MovableBoard) instead of the full Board interface.

  • Method Summary

    Methods inherited from interface ClearableBoard

    clearRows, getBoardMatrix, mergeBrickToBackground

    Methods inherited from interface MovableBoard

    getViewData, moveBrickDown, moveBrickLeft, moveBrickRight, rotateLeftBrick

    Methods inherited from interface ScorableBoard

    getScore

    Methods inherited from interface SpawnableBoard

    holdBrick, newGame, trySpawnNewBrick
